title: Microsoft Teams: Automatically view up to 9 videos (3x3) in Teams meetings in Chrome and Edge
description: Microsoft Teams Meetings currently supports a maximum of 4 videos (2x2) on the screen by default (i.e., Gallery view) on web browsers. With this update, users will be able to automatically see up to 9 videos (3x3) on Chrome and Edge on their screen by default without an explicit action.
